snapshot.label: Élő áttekintés
snapshot.caption: A teljesítményadatok 60 másodpercenként frissülnek, a jóváhagyott kifizetések pedig azonnal szinkronizálódnak.

metric.pendingChange: A kifizetések 2 munkanapon belül feldolgozásra kerülnek

create.title: Hozd létre a linkedet
create.description: Hozz létre egy egyedi ajánlói linket vagy promóciós kódot a Silence AI irányítópulton.

share.title: Oszd meg
share.description: Hívd meg a csapatokat e-mailben, LinkedInen és közösségeidben. Kövesd az eredményeket valós időben.

earn.title: Keress
earn.description: Szerezz jutalékot, amint az általad ajánlott ügyfelek aktiválják a Silence AI védelmet.

commission.heading: Egyenlegjutalmak

reward.title: 10% jutalom minden egyenlegfeltöltésre
reward.description: Amikor a meghívott csapat feltölti Silence AI pénztárcáját, a nettó összeg 10%-a azonnal jóváírásra kerül számodra.

settlement.title: Főkönyvi rendezés valós időben
settlement.description: A jutalmak egy percen belül megjelennek a partner egyenlegén – nincs szükség kézi jóváhagyásra.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawals processed in 2 business days
withdrawal.description: A kifizetési kérelmek automatikusan ellenőrzésre kerülnek, és két munkanapon belül megérkeznek a bankszámládra.

sample.label: Feltöltési példák
sample.caption: A partnerbevétel minden feltöltéssel nő – nincs szintnullázás és nincs terméktérképezés.

commission.note: A jutalék a fizetésfeldolgozási díjak levonása utáni nettó összegből kerül kiszámításra.

payments.question: Hogyan kapom meg a kifizetéseket?
payments.answer: A profilodban add hozzá VISA vagy Mastercard kártyaszámodat. A kifizetések közvetlenül a megadott kártyára utalhatók.

discounts.question: Kapnak kedvezményt az ajánlott ügyfelek?
discounts.answer: Nem. Az ajánlott ügyfelek nem kapnak kedvezményt vásárlásaikra; jutalékot csak a partner kap a sikeres ajánlások után.

statistics.question: Mikor látom az ajánlási statisztikáimat?
statistics.answer: Amint egy felhasználó a promókódoddal vagy ajánlói linkeddel regisztrál, e-mail címe és a kapcsolódó jutalom megjelenik a vezérlőpulton.

hero.headline: AI-SOC 1: Cybersecurity is neither expensive nor complicated anymore
hero.subheading: The all in one, AI-based cybersecurity system that combines:

web.title: Web Attack Protection
web.content: System can protect against ALL types of web attacks, such as DDoS, SQLi, and others, except business logic vulnerabilities

email.title: Email Attack Protection
email.content: System can protect against ALL types of email attacks, such as phishing, malware attachment, dangerous links, etc.

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability Finder
vulnerability.content: System can find the vulnerabilities within the code of the application and by dynamically interacting with your website/API, including the way of finding vulnerabilities through the intelligence system

cookie.title: Technical Cookies Notice
cookie.description: This website uses only first-party technical cookies that are set by us to remember your language preferences and ensure the cookie notice is not shown again on your next visit. No tracking or third-party cookies are used.

cmcGlobal.title: CMC with Global Traffic Monitoring
cmcGlobal.content: CMC (Centralized Management Console) integrates seamlessly with other security systems and is available under the same domain and interface as Global Shield and Security Tester allows you to manage network security at scale. From here, you can blacklist countries, close ports, and perform other operations

countryBlacklisting.title: Country Blacklisting
countryBlacklisting.content: Block all traffic originating from a specific country

portManagement.title: Port Management
portManagement.content: Close unused ports to reduce attack surface. For example, disabling port 22 when SSH access is not needed. To minimize the risk of system getting compromised

cmcEmail.title: CMC with Advanced Email Flow Visualizer
cmcEmail.content: CMC (Centralized Management Console) integrates seamlessly with other security systems and is available under the same domain and interface as Global Shield and Security Tester. Within this console, you can monitor email flows and review emails for all corporate users you've added

dynamicVulnerability.title: Dynamic Vulnerability Finder
dynamicVulnerability.content: Detects vulnerabilities by interacting with your website, including the way of finding vulnerabilities through the intelligence system

codeAnalyzer.title: Code Analyzer
codeAnalyzer.content: Identifies security issues directly in your codebase through a VS Code plugin, helping you fix problems before deployment

intelligenceReport.title: Intelligence Report
intelligenceReport.content: Generates detailed insights about your target, including open ports, running services, subdomains, and other sensitive information that may require action

fullVulnerability.title: FULL Vulnerability Check
fullVulnerability.content: A FULL vulnerability check includes both a dynamic vulnerability scan and a codebase vulnerability scan

features.webProtection: Protection against all types of web attacks, except business logic vulnerability exploitation
features.cmc: CMC with Global traffic monitoring system

emailProtector.title: Email Security
emailProtector.description:
Up to 10 emails per day
Additional emails: $0.035 each email

features.cmcEmail: CMC with most advanced email flow visualizer
features.visibility: Complete visibility of sent and received emails of all the email accounts, in CMC, with automatic threat categorization

securityTester.title: Vulnerability Finder
securityTester.description:
Up to 50 FULL vulnerability checks per month
Additional FULL checks: $0.5 each

solution.sectionSubtitle: Ready in 4 minutes and usable by any IT professional—no cybersecurity expertise required. We offer advanced visualization and affordability.

globalShield.title: Global Shield - CIA-Level Traffic Monitoring
globalShield.description: Our interactive 3D globe provides a stunning visualization of your web traffic, showing requests per second, active users, and traffic volume in bytes.

bullets.one: Easy setup: just specify your IP and domain.
bullets.two: Receive an agent IP to add to your DNS.

emailProtector.title: Email Protector - World's First AI Email Protection
emailProtector.description: The world's first AI-based email protection system. Our vector view makes it easy to track email flow over time and identify threats.

bullets.one: Detects spoofing, spam, phishing, and malware.
bullets.two: Admin can add email accounts for protection.
bullets.three: Most advanced commercial mail flow visualizer.

securityTester.title: Security Tester - Next-Gen Vulnerability Testing
securityTester.description: Our system provides a One-Time-Token (OTT) for full-coverage security checks. Simply connect via our browser or VSCode extension.

bullets.one: Specify security scope and target in the CMC.
bullets.two: Paste the OTT and start the security check.

cmc.title: Centralized Management Console (CMC)
cmc.description: All three components are managed through a unified console that provides centralized visualization, easy configuration and monitoring, and comprehensive security reporting.

items.title: 39 seconds
items.description: There is a hacker attack every 39 seconds

items.title: Every day
items.description: 30 000 websites get hacked every single day

floatingText.headline: Discover how hackers think
floatingText.description: Follow us for daily research on real attack methods and cyber threats

modal.title: Under active development
modal.body: The system is expected to be launched on October 10

webSecurity.title: Web security system: Website/API can be connected in 2 minutes
webSecurity.description: Protection against web attacks such as DDoS, SQLi, etc. There is also ability to close ports, it is very good practice to close port 22, when it is not being used

ciaMonitoring.title: CIA-Level Traffic Monitoring
ciaMonitoring.description: Our interactive 3D globe shows traffic volume by requests, users, and volume. The ability to see the history in the change of the number of users

userGrowth.title: Useful insights on the increase in the number of users
userGrowth.description: The ability to see the history of changes of the number of users

aiEmailProtection.title: World's First AI-based Email Protection system: Email network can be connected in 2 minutes
aiEmailProtection.description: For the admins, there is the CMC that shows complete visibility into all sent and received emails for accounts added by the administrator, with automatic threat categorization like spoofing, spam, phishing, dangerous link, and malware.

emailVisualization.title: Visualization of the sent and received emails
emailVisualization.description: CMC with the most advanced, commercially available email flow visualizer

secureWebmail.title: Secure Webmail Client
secureWebmail.description: For email accounts added by admin, there is the most secure webmail client. Detects and categorizes threats like spoofing, spam, phishing, and malware.

footer.addressValue: Media City Free Zone, Al Messaned, Sharjah, UAE

notFound.title: Az oldal nem található
notFound.description: Mindenhol kerestük, de nem találtuk ezt az oldalt.

heroSection.title: Egyedi AI és szoftverfejlesztés
heroSection.description: Gyártásra kész AI-ügynököket és egyedi szoftvereket építünk {country} és a {market} számára.
